items.name: Dave's Single Combo
items.description: It's our classic the way dave intended! A juicy quarter pound of fresh, never frozen beef decorated with premium toppings all between a warm toasted bun.

items.name: Dave' Double Combo
items.description: Oh yeah, you're seeing double. That's two fresh, never frozen beef patties with the freshest toppings on a warm toasted bun.

items.name: Dave's Tripe Combo
items.description: When hunger strikes, this is where you turn. With three quarter pound fresh, never-frozen beef patties and our premium toppings, there's no way you can walk away hungry.

items.name: Bacon Deluxe 1/4lb *Single Combo
items.description: Three strips of Applewood Smoked Bacon piled high atop a hot 'n juicy beef patty, made to order every time. Add cool and crisp veggies with a little condiment love and you've got a burger to satisfy your senses.

items.name: Baconator 1/2lb *Double Combo
items.description: Here's to the carnivores. Two 1/4 lb patties with six strips of bacon. There's not a single veggie to get in the way.

items.name: Son of Baconator Combo
items.description: Two juicy patties of 100% fresh, never frozen beef topped with strips of oven-cooked applewood smoked bacon. Without a single veggie to get in the way, it's a perfectly-sized meaty masterpiece.

items.name: Spicy Chicken Sandwich Combo
items.description: Wendy's decided that ordinary chicken needed a dose of adventure, so we invented the spicy chicken sandwich! Topped with freshly-sliced lettuce and tomato, this bold and zesty sandwich still isn't for the faint of heart.

items.name: Homestyle Chicken Sandwich Combo
items.description: Our homestyle chicken sandwich may seem simple. But there's something about a juicy chicken breast, lightly breaded and specially seasoned that takes this sandwich to the next level!

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich Combo
items.description: Marinated in a blend of herbs, this juicy all-white meat chicken breast is topped with smoky honey mustard, a spring green mix, tomato and a multi-grain bun. It just might be the best grilled chicken sandwich in town.

items.name: Spicy Asiago Club Combo
items.description: These aren't some boring ol' chicken sandwiches. Meet wendy's spicy Asiago ranch chicken club, tender, all-white meat spicy chicken breast topped with thick-cut applewood smoked bacon, Asiago cheese, creamy ranch sauce, hand-leafed lettuce and hand-sliced tomatoes.

items.name: HomeStyle Asiago Club Combo
items.description: Packed with tender, all-white meat chicken and thick-cut Applewood Smoked Bacon, Asiago Cheese and creamy ranch, you can say goodbye to boring chicken.

items.name: Grilled Asiago Club Combo
items.description: These aren't some boring ol' chicken sandwiches. Meet wendy's grilled Asiago ranch chicken club, tender, all-white meat chicken breast topped with thick-cut applewood smoked bacon, Asiago cheese, creamy ranch sauce, hand-leafed lettuce and hand-sliced tomatoes. Combo Drink Ch

items.name: Chicken Strips Combo
items.description: When the perfect balance of tender inside and crispy outside meet a seriously delicious Side of S’Awesome™ sauce, the only question now is…do you dip them or not?

items.name: 10 Piece Crispy Chicken Nuggets Combo
items.description: Marinated in a blend of herbs, this juicy all-white meat chicken breast is topped with smoky honey mustard, a spring green mix, tomato and a multi-grain bun. It just might be the best grilled chicken sandwich in town.

items.name: Kids 4 Piece Nuggets Combo
items.description: Nuggets. Need we say more?

items.name: Kids Hamburger Combo
items.description: It's a delicious hamburger, made fresh, right when it's ordered, that means it's easy to make it just the way your child likes it.

items.name: Kids Cheeseburger Combo
items.description: Fresh never frozen beef served hot off the grill and topped with American cheese. Being a kid never tasted to good.

items.name: Jr. Hamburger Deluxe
items.description: A Fresh Never Frozen beef patty loaded with all the cool, crisp toppings you want, like pickles, onions, red-ripe tomatoes and crispy lettuce. Made fresh when you order it. It certainly is deluxe.

items.name: Jr. Cheeseburger Deluxe
items.description: Our delicious 100% fresh, pure beef patty topped with all the essentials: cheese, pickles, onions, tomatoes and lettuce.

items.name: Jr. Bacon Cheeseburger
items.description: Topped with melting American cheese, applewood smoked bacon, lettuce, tomato and mayo, this is a simple hamburger with a big taste.

items.name: Cheesy Cheddar Burger
items.description: What could possibly be better than a burger with Cheddar Cheese? How about adding delicious, premium Cheddar Cheese sauce to it? Made fresh when you order it. Big on taste and small on price!

items.name: Spicy Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Wendy's decided that ordinary chicken needed a dose of adventure, so we invented the spicy chicken sandwich! Topped with freshly-sliced lettuce and tomato, this bold and zesty sandwich still isn't for the faint of heart.

items.name: Homestyle Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Our homestyle chicken sandwich may seem simple. But there's something about a juicy chicken breast, lightly breaded and specially seasoned that takes this sandwich to the next level!

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Marinated in a blend of herbs, this juicy all-white meat chicken breast is topped with smoky honey mustard, a spring green mix, tomato and a multi-grain bun. It just might be the best grilled chicken sandwich in town.

items.name: Spicy Asiago Ranch Club
items.description: These aren't some boring ol' chicken sandwiches. Meet wendy's spicy Asiago ranch chicken club, tender, all-white meat spicy chicken breast topped with thick-cut applewood smoked bacon, Asiago cheese, creamy ranch sauce, hand-leafed lettuce and hand-sliced tomatoes.

items.name: Homestyle Asiago Ranch Club
items.description: Packed with tender, all-white meat chicken and thick-cut applewood smoked bacon, Asiago cheese and creamy ranch, you can say goodbye to boring chicken.

items.name: Grilled Asiago Ranch Club
items.description: These aren't some boring ol' chicken sandwiches. Meet wendy's grilled Asiago ranch chicken club, tender, all-white meat chicken breast topped with thick-cut applewood smoked bacon, Asiago cheese, creamy ranch sauce, hand-leafed lettuce and hand-sliced tomatoes.

items.name: Homestyle Chicken Strips
items.description: When the perfect balance of tender inside and crispy outside meet a seriously delicious Side of S’Awesome™ sauce, the only question now is…do you dip them or not?

items.name: Crispy Chicken Nuggets
items.description: Nuggets. Need we say more?

items.name: Grilled Chicken Wrap
items.description: Our grilled chicken breast is dressed to impress with crisp lettuce, cheddar cheese and smoky honey mustard. This time, it's all wrapped up and ready to go in a flour tortilla.

items.name: Spicy Chicken Wrap
items.description: Have you ever dreamed about a Spicy Chicken Wrap to take on the go? Well stop dreaming and start ordering.

items.name: Power Mediterranean Salad
items.description: Quinoa at wendy's you betcha. We're taking our salad game to next level freshly-grilled chicken feta-cheese, hummus and of course, our sun-dried tomato quinoa blend.

items.name: Apple Pecan Salad
items.description: Hand-picked red and green apples, crumbled blue cheese, sweet cranberries, roasted pecans, warm grilled chicken and marzetti simply dressed pomegranate vinaigrette. How do you like them apples.

items.name: Spicy Caesar Salad
items.description: Everyone knows that classic Caesar salad. Ours is hand-chopped, with spicy chicken breast for a fresh take on an old classic.

items.name: Taco Salad
items.description: All the good things about a taco are in this delicious salad. Our famous chili, shredded cheddar, diced tomatoes and salsa make this salad anything but ordinary.

items.name: Caesar Side Salad
items.description: We got your back with a perfectly-sized Caesar Salad made in-house, with freshly cut romaine and shredded Asiago cheese.

items.name: Garden Side Salad
items.description: We teamed up with Marzetti® to ensure the mixed greens, cheddar cheese, tomato and red onion of our side salad had the perfect Simply Dressed® accompaniment.

items.name: Bacon & Cheese Baked Potato
items.description: Piping-hot baked potato straight from the oven topped with a creamy cheese sauce.

items.name: Broccoli & Cheese Baked Potato
items.description: Warm up to the distinctive taste of rich, creamy cheese and our signature chili over our delicious oven-baked potato.

items.name: Sour Cream & Chive Baked Potato
items.description: Perfect by itself or as a side, it's a delicious baked potato to go or to dine in. The choice is all yours.

items.name: Plain Potato
items.description: Slow-baked in an oven, not zapped in a microwave. Need we say more? Our Plain Baked Potato is perfect by itself or paired with a sandwich. Great taste. Great value.

items.name: Bacon Portabella Baked Potato
items.description: Warm up to the distinctive taste of rich, melty cheese, Applewood Smoked Bacon, and mushrooms on our delicious oven-baked potato. It’s the just-right choice for lunch, dinner or late-night snack.

items.name: Fries
items.description: Everyone has fries, but no one does them like wendy's. That's because ours are naturally cut, served hot and crispy with a sprinkle of sea salt. You've had fries. Now try some real fries.

items.name: Chili
items.description: Who else but wendy's could bring you hearty chili made with our signature fresh, never frozen beef it's the perfect comfort food anytime of the year.

items.name: Poutine
items.description: Fries with sea salt topped with Canadian cheese curds and a rich poutine sauce. Take your meal to the next level with Wendy's delicious Signature Sides.

items.name: Bacon Poutine
items.description: A melty medley of poutine sauce and cheese curds sit atop fries with sea salt with a generous helping of Applewood-Smoked bacon one would expect from the Wendy's name. Potatoes have never had it so good.

items.name: Chili Cheese Fries
items.description: Fries with sea salt topped with slow-cooked, rich and meaty chili. Take your meal to the next level with Wendy's delicious Signature Sides.

items.name: Chili Cheese Nachos
items.description: Great for a late night snack. Crispy corn nachos, served with our famous rich and meaty chili sauce and topped with a premium Cheddar Cheese sauce.

items.name: Fountain Drink
items.description: Grab something fizzy. Something cold. Something refreshing. Grab yourself a Coca-cola.

items.name: Strawberry Lemonade
items.description: Life gave us lemons and strawberries, so we made a lemonade that shows how real ingredients lead to better quality.

items.name: Honest Tropical Green Tea
items.description: Get some green in your life with organic freshly brewed green tea. Made to make you feel centered with natural flavors and real organic cane sugar.

items.name: Chocolate Milk
items.description: A delicious drink that goes with everything on the menu! It's also 25% of your recommended daily value for calcium!

items.name: White Milk
items.description: Choose white milk - a great go-with for every meal. Plus, your bones will thank you for it.

items.name: Orange Pekoe Tea
items.description: Enjoy an English breakfast hot tea with your meal today.

items.name: Coffee
items.description: Brewed fresh all day long, stop by anytime for a classic cup of hot coffee.

items.name: Dasani Bottled Water
items.description: Quench your thirst with pure, fresh taste. It’s the drink that goes with any meal.

items.name: Original Lemonade
items.description: With no artificial ingredients or preservatives, this summer taste is as real as it gets.

items.name: Orange Juice
items.description: Delicious and refreshing, 100% juice that's a favourite for kids everywhere.

items.name: Apple Juice
items.description: Sweet and tangy 100% juice that's the perennial favourite for kids of all ages.

items.name: Frosty
items.description: Cool, creamy and refreshing. Made with real milk, nothing satisfies more than this Wendy's classic.
